legacy.full_text: El Presidente Xi Jinping sostuvo un encuentro con el Presidente de México Andrés Manuel López Obrador @lopezobrador_. https://t.co/WyLni6EsHQ

legacy.full_text: El año pasado, ambos países llevaron a cabo una serie de actividades para festejar el 50º aniversario de sus relaciones diplomáticas, y este año, acogen el 10º aniversario de su Asociación Estratégica Integral. https://t.co/Gho44EBsmf

legacy.full_text:
Full text of President Xi Jinping’s speech at the welcome dinner by friendly organizations in the U.S. which was interrupted more than a dozen times by applause from the audience. It’s about the people. A must read.

🔗https://t.co/My5D2pd6Xv https://t.co/4iM3eDoJe3

legacy.full_text: Governor @GavinNewsom promised to get President Xi a #GoldenStateWarriors jersey when they met in Beijing last month — and here it is. https://t.co/Rh2TNjTKE5

legacy.full_text: A heartwarming reunion with old friends -- President Xi joined his 1985 Iowa hosts, Flying Tigers veterans, members of the Kuliang Friends and other Americans who have helped build a strong China-U.S. friendship at a welcome dinner in #SanFrancisco. https://t.co/U2pYSDLMpG

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The passage of time is like a surging river -- much is washed away, but the most valuable stays. https://t.co/UWgNtinG2e

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The historical trend of China-U.S. peaceful coexistence will not change. The ultimate wish of our two peoples for exchanges and cooperation will not change. The world’s expectations for a steadily growing China-U.S. relationship will not change.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: For any great cause to succeed, it must take root in the people and be accomplished by the people. Growing China-U.S. friendship is such a great cause.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Throughout the 70 years and more since the founding of the People’s Republic, China has not provoked a conflict or war, or occupied a single inch of foreign land.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The modernization we are pursuing is not for China alone. We are ready to work with all countries to advance global modernization featuring peaceful development, mutually beneficial cooperation and common prosperity.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The San Diego Zoo & the Californians very much look forward to welcoming pandas🐼back. China is ready to continue its cooperation with the U.S. on panda conservation and do its best to meet the wishes of the Californians so as to deepen the friendly ties between our two peoples.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: President Xi said China sympathizes deeply with the American people, especially the young, for the sufferings that #Fentanyl has inflicted upon them. He and President Biden have agreed to set up a working group on counternarcotics cooperation and help the U.S. tackle drug abuse. https://t.co/Rdq4GTswua

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: To increase exchanges between our peoples, especially between the youth, China is ready to invite 50,000 young Americans to China on exchange and study programs in the next 5 years.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: President Xi said he and President Biden agreed to promote dialogue and cooperation, in the spirit of mutual respect, in areas including diplomacy, economy and trade, people-to-people exchange, education, science and technology, agriculture, military, law enforcement and AI. https://t.co/WvxNzS0rEd

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: China never bets against the U.S., and never interferes in its internal affairs. China has no intention to challenge the U.S. or to unseat it. Instead, we will be glad to see a confident, open, ever-growing and prosperous U.S.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Likewise, the U.S. should not bet against China, or interfere in China's internal affairs. It should instead welcome a peaceful, stable and prosperous China.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: Win-win cooperation is the trend of the times, and it is also an inherent property of China-U.S. relations. China and the U.S. are fully able to help each other succeed and achieve win-win outcomes.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: The more difficulties there are, the greater the need for us to forge a closer bond between our peoples and to open our hearts to each other, and more people need to speak up for the relationship. We should build more bridges and pave more roads for people-to-people interactions.

legacy.description:
Assistant Minister of Foreign Affairs, 
Foreign Ministry Spokesperson, 
Director General, Information Department, MFA PRC. 
Get to know us more @MFA_China
legacy.name: Hua Chunying 华春莹

legacy.full_text: China and the U.S. will roll out more measures to facilitate travels and promote people-to-people exchanges, including increasing direct passenger flights and streamlining visa application procedures. We hope that our two peoples will make more visits, contacts and exchanges.
